overview: Life as a couple... loving each other; but what about fidelity? It's put to the test by the huge-dicked estate agent, a wild psychiatrist, an ardent motorcyclist and a group of foreign students overseas to study tongues.  How can you resist 14 young Europeans - Czech, German, Swiss, Italian, French? Enthusiasts both of strength and of tenderness - romantics and muscular hard men.  They follow their destinies, take each other, give each other, swap their sensual bodies with vigour, passion and - above all - no limits!  Love has no limit.
title: Without Limits
